rukus.text: 34|31|i khur'anilakatte, itin mumpulla vedattilakatte nannal visvasikkunnate alla enn satyanisedhikal parannu. (nabiye,) i akramikal tannalute raksitavinre atukkal nirttappetunna sandarbham ni kantirunnenkil! avaril orea vibhagavum maruvibhagattinre mel kurram areapicc keantirikkum. balahinarayi ganikkappettavar valuppam naticcirunnavareat parayum: ninnalillayirunnenkil nannal visvasikalayirunnene
34|32|valuppam naticcavar balahinarayi ganikkappettavareat parayum: margadarsanam ninnalkk vannettiyatin sesam atil ninn ninnale tatannat nannalanea? alla, ninnal kurravalikal tanneyayirunnu

34|34|etearu nattil nam takkitukarane ayaccappealum, ninnal enteannumayi niyeagikkappettirikkunnuvea atil nannal avisvasikkunnavarakunnu enn avitatte sukhalealupar parayatirunnittilla
34|35|avar parannu: nannal kututal svattukkalum santanannalumullavarakunnu. nannal siksikkappetunnavaralla
